title: Places Management App(In Progress)
description: A full-stack place management app built with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Users can add, edit, and delete locations, authenticate, and view places on a map

title: React Course Goals App
description: This is a simple React application I built for practice. It allows users to add their course goals dynamically. The app consists of a form where users can enter a new goal, which then gets added to the list below. It demonstrates the use of React state, event handling, and component-based UI updates.
